eg.console

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.console.Console

  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    The console for showing messages and for running system processes. System commands are run by this ProcessStarter.

    Created by Projects

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessStarter

        public ProcessStarter getProcessStarter()
        Gets this ProcessStarter
        Returns:
        this ProcessStarter

      • canPrint

        public boolean canPrint()
        Returns the boolean that, if true, indicates that text can be printed. False indicates that a process started in this ProcessStarter currently uses the console. A warning dialog is shown in this case.
        Returns:
        the boolean value

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the console
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the console is currently used by a process run in this ProcessStarter

      • clearAndPrint

        public void clearAndPrint(java.lang.String text)
        Clears the console and prints the specified text
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the console is currently used by a process run in this ProcessStarter

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String text)
        Prints the specified text
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the console is currently used by a process run in this ProcessStarter

      • toTop

        public void toTop()
        Jumps to the beginning of the console
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the console is currently used by a process run in this ProcessStarter
